document_data.name: Urgrosh
document_data.mainbody: An '''urgrosh''', also known as a '''spear-axe''', was an exotic two-handed melee weapon.
document_data.Description: Urgroshs were much like the [[dwarven waraxe]], but with a longer haft. Longer even than a [[greataxe]], but not so long as to be considered a [[pole arm]]. The gripping end of the haft was mounted with a spearhead.
document_data.Weaponology: Because of their two heads, the ''urgrosh'' could deal either slashing or piercing damage. The ''urgrosh'' was considered a double weapon that could be used as if fighting with two separate weapons provided it was wielded two-handed. If used one-handed, it was treated as either a [[shortspear]] or a [[battleaxe]].

Notable Owners.Races & Sentient Creatures: * [[Dwarf|Dwarves]] were known to favor this weapon.
